channel.title: How do i edit my shops?
channel.description: i thought it was shop.java or class but its not there...all i see is shop handler and i know thats not it...i wanna find the file or thing where i can edite the items found in my shops and the prices......pl0x3rz help?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 01:48:21 PM[/size][hr]...help plox oh and this tooo plox [IMG]http://i208.photobucket.com/albums/bb127/zxr3dh0txz/untitled.jpg[/img] and lastly how come the tele icons dont wonrk like tele to gharock or varrock or lumby?

item.title: How do i edit my shops?
item.dc:creator: @r3d1 r3d_
item.description:
@r3d1 wrote:

i dont think there is s itemcfg inmy colder…i see item.java and item.class[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 02:01:56 PM[/size][hr][quote=“zez1ma boy, post:3, topic:163716”]right shops.cfg to change shops items.cfg to change prices and to fix the problem u have to make it so u wield ur top as a top not weapon[/quote] lolz uhmmmm yeah the 2nd thing explained wasnt correct cuz i changed all id’s to thier proper place like a sara robe top goest to body and fish bowl helm goes to hats but its just messed up…they go to the right spot but not look it it did.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 02:33:03 PM[/size][hr]any1 plox?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 09, 2007, 04:55:43 PM[/size][hr]please help
